TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HiddenField extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HiddenField Inherits Control Implements IPostBackDataHandler
public ref class HiddenField : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler
type HiddenField = class inherit Control interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 表示用來儲存非顯示值的隱藏欄位。

span.span: Represents a hidden field used to store a non-displayed value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用來儲存需要保存在張貼至伺服器的值。The control is used to store a value that needs to be persisted across posts to the server. 它會轉譯為``項目。It is rendered as an `` element. 通常檢視狀態、 工作階段狀態和 cookie，用來維護狀態的 Web Form 網頁中。Normally view state, session state, and cookies are used to maintain the state of a Web Forms page. 不過，如果這些方法會停用或未提供，您可以使用控制項儲存狀態的值。However, if these methods are disabled or are not available, you can use the control to store state values. 若要指定的值控制，請使用屬性。To specify the value for a control, use the property. 您可以取得每次呼叫的常式的值控制送到伺服器建立的事件處理常式的公佈間變更事件。You can provide a routine that gets called every time the value of the control changes between posts to the server by creating an event handler for the event. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用控制項來儲存值的張貼至伺服器之間的控制。The following examples show how to use the control to store the value of a control between posts to the server. > [!IMPORTANT] > 範例有接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅的文字方塊。The examples have a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/CS/hiddenfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/VB/hiddenfieldvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HiddenFieldWebServerControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenFieldWebServerControl/CS/HiddenFieldWebServerControl.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HiddenFieldWebServerControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenFieldWebServerControl/VB/HiddenFieldWebServerControl.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 建立 物件，用來表示不允許子控制項。

span.span: Creates an object used to indicate that child controls are not allowed.
Always returns an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用來建立來儲存 Web 伺服器控制項的子控制項的物件。The method is normally used to create a object for storing the child controls of a Web Server control. 在此實作中的方法，一律會傳回集合，表示不允許子控制項。In this implementation of the method, an collection is always returned to indicate that child controls are not allowed.

span.para: 在擴充控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法，以支援子控制項。
When extending the control, you can override this method to support child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web Form 網頁架構會追蹤傳回的所有伺服器控制項`true`方法呼叫，再叫用那些控制項上。The Web Forms page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` to this method call, then invokes the on those controls.

span.span: An object that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時的值控制項送到伺服器的公佈間變更。The event is raised when the value of the control changes between posts to the server. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 應用程式 控制項的狀態已變更。

span.span: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用 helper 方法類別，以告知 ASP.NET 應用程式的狀態的控制項已變更。The method is a helper method used by the class to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

span.para: 在衍生類別引發變更事件回傳至伺服器時，可以覆寫這個方法。
This method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events when it posts back to the server.

span.span: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來呈現伺服器控制項內容，以使用指定的用戶端瀏覽器物件。The method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified object.

span.para: 在擴充控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法，以呈現控制項的自訂內容。
When extending the control, you can override this method to render custom content for the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定隱藏欄位的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the hidden field.
The value of the hidden field.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷值的控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the value of the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性指定的值控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/CS/hiddenfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/VB/hiddenfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 當 控制項的值在送至伺服器的公佈間變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時的值控制項送到伺服器的公佈間變更。The event is raised when the value of the control changes between posts to the server. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以顯示值控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to display the value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/CS/hiddenfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/VB/hiddenfieldvb.aspx#1)]
